languages.text: "Ты держишь подле себя забавн{mf|ого|ую} мон-кай, Ирлиэт. Он{mf||а} понимает наш язык и даже знает что-то о приветственных обычаях. Но едва ли это делает {mf|его|ее} достойным спутником на твоем {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Пути{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Ты держишь подле себя забавн{mf|ого|ую} мон-кай, Ирлиэт. Он понимает наш язык и даже знает что-то о приветственных обычаях. Но едва ли это делает {mf|его|ее} достойным спутником на твоем {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Пути{/g}".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "You have got yourself a most amusing mon-keigh to keep you company, Yrliet. {mf|H|Sh}e understands our language and even knows a thing or two about customary greetings. Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Ты держишь подле себя забавн{mf|ого|ую} мон-кай, Ирлиэт. Он{mf||а} понимает наш язык и даже знает что-то о приветственных обычаях. Но едва ли это делает {mf|его|ее} достойным спутником на твоем {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Пути{/g}".

Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."

Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "You have got yourself a most amusing mon-keigh to keep you company, Yrliet. {mf|H|Sh}e understands our language and even knows a thing or two about customary greetings. Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Te has buscado {mf|un|una} mon-keigh de lo más {mf|divertido|divertida} para hacerte compañía, Yrliet. Entiende nuestro idioma e incluso conoce alguno de nuestros saludos tradicionales. Aunque nada de eso le haga {mf|digno|digna} de acompañarte en tu {g|Encyclopedia:Path}senda{/g}».
languages.original_text: "You have got yourself a most amusing mon-keigh to keep you company, Yrliet. {mf|H|Sh}e understands our language and even knows a thing or two about customary greetings. Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Te has buscado {mf|un|una} mon-keigh de lo más {mf|divertido|divertida} para hacerte compañía, Yrliet. Entiende nuestro idioma e incluso conoce alguno de nuestros saludos tradicionales. Aunque nada de eso le haga {mf|digno|digna} de acompañarte en tu {g|Encyclopedia:Path}senda{/g}».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「お供をしてくれる実に面白いモン＝ケイを手に入れたんだな、ユリエット。そいつは我々の言葉を理解し、慣例的な挨拶についても一つや二つ知っているようだ。だからといって、やつがお前の{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道{/g}を共に歩むにふさわしい者とは思えんが」
languages.original_text: "You have got yourself a most amusing mon-keigh to keep you company, Yrliet. {mf|H|Sh}e understands our language and even knows a thing or two about customary greetings. Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「お供をしてくれる実に面白いモン＝ケイを手に入れたんだな、ユリエット。そいつは我々の言葉を理解し、慣例的な挨拶についても一つや二つ知っているようだ。だからといって、やつがお前の{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道{/g}を共に歩むにふさわしい者とは思えんが」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “陪在你身边的猴子还真有趣，伊莉耶特。他能听懂我们的语言，甚至对我们的习惯与问候语也略知一二。不过即便如此，{mf|他|她}也并不会成为你的{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道途{/g}有价值的伙伴。”
languages.original_text: "You have got yourself a most amusing mon-keigh to keep you company, Yrliet. {mf|H|Sh}e understands our language and even knows a thing or two about customary greetings. Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “陪在你身边的猴子还真有趣，伊莉耶特。他能听懂我们的语言，甚至对我们的习惯与问候语也略知一二。不过即便如此，{mf|他|她}也并不会成为你的{g|Encyclopedia:Path}道途{/g}有价值的伙伴。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh qui vous tient compagnie est des plus {mf|amusants|amusantes}, Yrliet. {mf|Il|Elle} comprend notre langue et sait même une chose ou deux des salutations traditionnelles. Pour autant, cela ne fait pas {mf|de lui un compagnon|d'elle une compagne} digne de vous accompagner sur votre {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Voie{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "You have got yourself a most amusing mon-keigh to keep you company, Yrliet. {mf|H|Sh}e understands our language and even knows a thing or two about customary greetings. Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh qui vous tient compagnie est des plus {mf|amusants|amusantes}, Yrliet. {mf|Il|Elle} comprend notre langue et sait même une chose ou deux des salutations traditionnelles. Pour autant, cela ne fait pas {mf|de lui un compagnon|d'elle une compagne} digne de vous accompagner sur votre {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Voie{/g}. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Da habt Ihr ja {mf|einen|eine} sehr {mf|lustigen|lustige} Chem-Pan-Sey zur Unterhaltung angeschleppt, Yrliet. {mf|Er|Sie} versteht unsere Sprache und kennt sogar unsere Begrüßungen. Das macht {mf|ihn|sie} aber noch lange zu keinem würdigen Begleiter auf Eurem {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Pfad{/g}."
languages.original_text: "You have got yourself a most amusing mon-keigh to keep you company, Yrliet. {mf|H|Sh}e understands our language and even knows a thing or two about customary greetings. Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Da habt Ihr ja {mf|einen|eine} sehr {mf|lustigen|lustige} Chem-Pan-Sey zur Unterhaltung angeschleppt, Yrliet. {mf|Er|Sie} versteht unsere Sprache und kennt sogar unsere Begrüßungen. Das macht {mf|ihn|sie} aber noch lange zu keinem würdigen Begleiter auf Eurem {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Pfad{/g}."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Arkadaş olarak olabilecek en keyifli mon-keigh'i bulmuşsun Yrliet. Dilimizi anlıyor, hatta geleneksel selamlarımız hakkında bir şeyler biliyor. Elbette bu hususlardan hiçbiri, onu {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Yolunda{/g} sana eşlik etmeye layık bir yoldaş yapmaz."
languages.original_text: "You have got yourself a most amusing mon-keigh to keep you company, Yrliet. {mf|H|Sh}e understands our language and even knows a thing or two about customary greetings. Not that any of it makes {mf|him|her} a worthy companion for you to have on your {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Path{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Sana arkadaşlık etmesi için olabilecek en keyifli mon-keigh'i bulmuşsun Yrliet. Dilimizi anlıyor ve hatta geleneksel selamlarımız hakkında da bir şeyler biliyor. Elbette bu hususlardan hiçbiri, onu {g|Encyclopedia:Path}Yol{/g}unda sana eşlik etmeye layık bir yoldaş yapacak değil."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
